entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:22 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 08:27 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: NNE 20 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
